short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adapts the code editor window to full screen for best programming experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 1.4 Features:

 - Editor height adapts to screen size
 - Name on page title
 - Support:
        Apex Classes, Triggers, Components,
        Visualforce Pages, Email templates
 - Awesomeness also included!

Press the icon at the url bar to start/exit the fullscreen mode.

Awesome!
